programme.title: The Intimate
programme.desc: A bride-to-be accepts an invitation from a stranger to be his woman for a day, thinking it is her last fling.

programme.title: My Wife is a Gangster 3 : HK Edition
programme.desc: A Mafia boss's daughter is wrongly accused of murder and sent to Korea, where an assassin is sent to kill her.

programme.title: A Resistance
programme.desc: Imprisoned for protesting Japan, Gwan-sun unites inmates and sparks a resistance that lives beyond her death.

programme.title: Mood of the day
programme.desc: On the train to Busan, Soo-jung meets Jae-hyun, self-proclaimed Agapemonite, embracing one-night stands.

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman grows tired of life in the city and returns to her hometown in the countryside.

programme.title: The King of Prison
programme.desc: In prison, new inmate Man-hee caught in rising tensions between Beom-teol and Tae-soo as violence escalates.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il, who is a five-month pregnant ahead of her marriage, goes to her hometown to find her biological father, whom she has never seen since the age of seven. After returning to Seoul, To-il’s mom, stepdad and biological father join forces to find the groom-to-be who has been missing on the day of the meeting with bride-groom families.

programme.title: Life Risking Romance
programme.desc: What would you do if the love of your life were a serial killer? A crime novel writer Han Jane has become a nuisance to her neighbors by often mistaking her neighbors as suspects of crime. One day, she hears someone’s scream from upstairs and decides that the person upstairs is the serial killer on loose. While Jane keeps pursuing the serial killer with help of Jason and her childhood friend, she witnesses a shocking scene that changes everything she had believed so far.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: In Joseon, a satirical play by Heung-boo gains fame, drawing attention from both rulers and rebels.

programme.title: SAMJIN COMPANY ENGLISH CLASS
programme.desc: Three female office workers take English classes for promotions and team up to expose company corruption.

programme.title: Suddenly In Dark Night
programme.desc: Seon-hui suspects husband’s infidelity since arrival of their young housekeeper who carries a mysterious doll.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Hyun-jung is worried about her younger sister who has vanished and tracks down her sister's last whereabouts.

programme.title: My Wife
programme.desc: Si-hun manages a shabby house for rent. Next day, Mi-jung takes the room and they start to fall in love.
